SELECT t2.mid FROM ( SELECT phone_num FROM eap_employee WHERE ee_id = #{eeId} and is_delete = 0 ) t1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT mobile_phone, mid FROM member where user_type = 1 ) t2 ON t1.phone_num = t2.mobile_phone

SELECT ee_id,ee.pg_id from eap_enterprise ee where pg_id in (SELECT pgm.pg_id from psycho_group_member pgm where pgm.mid = #{mid} and pgm.is_delete = 0 and pgm.is_enable = 0) and ee.is_delete = 0 and ee.is_enable =0
